amendment.description: Amendment includes energy storage as a form of energy that DOE should consider to enhance emergency preparedness for energy supply disruptions during natural disasters.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 3 printed in House report 114-359 to include energy storage as a form of energy that DOE should consider to enhance emergency preparedness for energy supply disruptions during natural disasters.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Peters amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Peters.
